section_id: ## Part III: Cloning Mechanism Error Bounds

hints.label: thm-cloning-mechanism-error
hints.title: Cloning Mechanism Error (Target)
hints.content:
258: :label: thm-cloning-mechanism-error
259: 
260: Let $\nu_N^{\text{ideal}}$ be the QSD under idealized instantaneous resampling and let $\nu_N^{\text{discrete}}$ be the QSD under the discrete cloning mechanism. For any Lipschitz observable $\phi$ with constant $L_\phi$, we have:
261: 
262: $$
263: \left| \mathbb{E}_{\nu_N^{\text{discrete}}} [\phi] - \mathbb{E}_{\nu_N^{\text{ideal}}} [\phi] \right| \leq C_{\text{clone}} \cdot L_\phi \cdot \Delta t
264: $$
hints.section: ## Part III: Cloning Mechanism Error Bounds
hints.raw_directive:
255: Quantify the error introduced by the discrete cloning mechanism compared to the theoretical idealized resampling.
256: 
257: :::{prf:theorem} Cloning Mechanism Error (Target)
258: :label: thm-cloning-mechanism-error
259: 
260: Let $\nu_N^{\text{ideal}}$ be the QSD under idealized instantaneous resampling and let $\nu_N^{\text{discrete}}$ be the QSD under the discrete cloning mechanism. For any Lipschitz observable $\phi$ with constant $L_\phi$, we have:
261: 
262: $$
263: \left| \mathbb{E}_{\nu_N^{\text{discrete}}} [\phi] - \mathbb{E}_{\nu_N^{\text{ideal}}} [\phi] \right| \leq C_{\text{clone}} \cdot L_\phi \cdot \Delta t
264: $$
265:

hints.label: lem-inelastic-collision-error
hints.title: Inelastic Collision Error
hints.content:
299: :label: lem-inelastic-collision-error
300: 
301: The momentum redistribution via inelastic collisions ({prf:ref}`def-clone-inelastic-collision`) satisfies:
302: 
303: $$
304: \mathbb{E}[\|v_{\text{new}}^{(i)} - v_{\text{target}}^{(i)}\|^2] \leq C_{\text{inel}} \cdot \delta^2
305: $$
hints.section: ## Part III: Cloning Mechanism Error Bounds
hints.raw_directive:
296: **Key Lemma** (to prove):

298: :::{prf:lemma} Inelastic Collision Error
299: :label: lem-inelastic-collision-error
300: 
301: The momentum redistribution via inelastic collisions ({prf:ref}`def-clone-inelastic-collision`) satisfies:
302: 
303: $$
304: \mathbb{E}[\|v_{\text{new}}^{(i)} - v_{\text{target}}^{(i)}\|^2] \leq C_{\text{inel}} \cdot \delta^2
305: $$
